"Colossal Mutants":
"Colossal Mutants are special enemies which only appear at certain times.

Colossal Mutants may appear in some Exploration Sections when you defeat Dread Enemies near markers."

"Colossal Mutants are currently appearing in the following Exploration Sections:

・Northern Aelio
・Central Retem
・Southern Kvaris
・Dreisen Plant"
